results.name: Row sums of triangle A101980, which is the matrix logarithm of A008459 (squared entries of Pascal's triangle).
comment: A101981 is essentially a signed offset version of A002190 and is related to Bessel functions.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 23 2004
